class.name: za_controllers/CartesianVelocityController
class.description: A controller that executes a short motion based on cartesian velocities

class.name: za_controllers/CartesianPosVelController
class.description: A controller that executes a short motion based on cartesian velocities and position

class.name: za_controllers/TaskPriorityController
class.description: A controller that executes a short motion based on task priority control

class.name: za_controllers/CartesianTrajectoryController
class.description: A controller that executes cartesian trajectories using a trajectory adapter

class.name: za_controllers/TaskPriorityTrajectoryController
class.description: A controller that executes cartesian trajectories using a trajectory adapter and task priority control
